summary: Moth Room Contains the essential, assessable by a moth jar in the Vanilla Homes
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a [b]MothJar [/b]to a shelf in [b]Breezehome[/b], [b]Hjerim[/b], [b]Proudspire Manor[/b], [b]Honeyside[/b], and lastly [b]Vlindrel Hall[/b] which takes you to a basement extension room wtih everything you need; 

==================================================================================================================================
[b]Current Update

v 1.4
[/b][list][*][b]Fix the Mannequins in the Crawl.[/b][/*]
[*][b]Added a standalone expanison for hearthfire houses. [color=#980000]BUT I WARN YOU DO NOT DO NOT... ACTIVATE THIS OTHER MOD WITH THE ORIGINAL SINCE THE STANDALONE HEARTHFIRE COPY IS A DOUBLE MEANING IT WILL MOST LIKELY CRASH[/color].
[/b][/*]
[/list]=-------------------=-------------------------=----------------------------------------=------------------------------------------------------=-----------------------------------=
[b]Previous Updates[/b]

V 1.3
[list][*][b]Added a spell tome on the workbench - This spell tome is a spell that teleports you from anywhere to the Moth Room,
easier way to get around.[/b][/*]
[*][b]Fixed the problem with the whiterun switch mistaking naming.[/b][/*]
[/list]
V 1.2
[list][*][b]Added in a Crawl (Added room with 4 chests 3 mannequin) reason this room is now diemsonal meaning u will have access to these at what ever way you enter the room [/b][/*]
[/list]V 1.1
[list][*][b]Links to all the Vanilla homes[/b][/*]
[/list]V 1.0
[list][*][b]Workbench[/b][/*]
[*][b]Smelter[/b][/*]
[*][b]Grindstone[/b][/*]
[*][b]Achemy Table
[/b][/*]
[*][b]Enchanter Table[/b][/*]
[*][b]Forge[/b][/*]
[*][b]Tanning Rack
[/b][/*]
[/list]
This also on one wall adds some buttons that connect to each of the Vanillia houses in skyrim. 

For now the button that says where the location will be for example Whiterun is breezehome. 

Updates are on the way to come. 

This is Dark Citizen a.k.a Duck's which ive given permission to my friend on steam to upload since steam is to buggy for me [b]
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=379772623[/b]
author: Duck -   Dark - Citizen
